title: GlobalStratotypePoint
description: A type of stratigraphic point used to define a globally agreed point in geologic time.  This class does not have any properties beyond those inherited from <font color="#4f81bd">StratigraphicPoint</font>.

primaryGuidingCriterion.title: primaryGuidingCriterion
primaryGuidingCriterion.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">primaryGuidingCriterion:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a description of the primary criterion used to establish the stratigraphic point.

additionalCorrelationProperty-1.title: additionalCorrelationProperty
additionalCorrelationProperty-1.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">additionnalCorrelationProperty:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains any additional criteria used to establish the stratigraphic point.

additionalCorrelationProperty-2.title: additionalCorrelationProperty
additionalCorrelationProperty-2.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">additionnalCorrelationProperty:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains any additional criteria used to establish the stratigraphic point.

additionalCorrelationProperty-3.title: additionalCorrelationProperty
additionalCorrelationProperty-3.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">additionnalCorrelationProperty:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains any additional criteria used to establish the stratigraphic point.

status.title: status
status.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">status:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a description of the status of stratigraphic point (e.g., formally accepted, etc.).
